name: KuduZipApiDeploy
description: Upload a zip package to the Kudu zip deployment api
author: Arjan van Rijn
helpMarkDown: Kudu Zip Deploy uses the Kudu Sync deployment engine for updating files

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: AzureRM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription for the deployment.

inputs.name: WebAppName
inputs.label: Web App Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select the name of an existing AzureRM Web Application.

inputs.name: ManageSlotFlag
inputs.label: Manage Slot
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the option to Manage an existing slot other than the Production slot. If this option is not selected the Task is executed against the Production slot.

inputs.name: ResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select the Azure Resource Group that contains the AzureRM Web App specified above.

inputs.name: SlotName
inputs.label: Slot
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select an existing Slot other than the Production slot.

inputs.name: IsAsync
inputs.label: Is Async
inputs.helpMarkDown: The task will complete after the Zip file is uploaded. Kudu will continue to run the deployment asynchronously.
